TITLE: Italian islands become 'sex pilgrimage' sites
SUMMARY: They're pristine, wild and extremely hot -- and not just because of the high temperature and the stunning volcanic landscape with constant little eruptions.

TITLE: 8 houses built in impossible places
SUMMARY: Architecture can flirt with nature in expressive yet subtle ways. The idea in architecture is often to harmonize, not dominate, the landscapes. This can prove a challenge, however, when faced with steep slopes, cliff faces and mountainsides.
